name: Gulf Echoes: Tent of Treason
description:
Note: This is a shortened version of our upcoming game Gulf Echoes: Memories of the Past. If you enjoy this game, consider adding Gulf Echoes: Memories of the Past to your steam wishlist! Gulf Echoes is a Co-op only game, two players require their own copy of the game. The game also relies on communicating with each other.

Delve into the tale set in the Arabian gulf region. A cooperative puzzle adventure that traverses the threads of time. Play with a partner to navigate two intertwining times.

You and your partner must choose between two paths. Each one of you will choose a separate path and explore the game from a different perspective.



Your journey begins in a secluded desert tent, where betrayal casts a shadow on age-old friendships. Discover the clues, solve the puzzles and work together to finish the chapter Tent of Treason. Discover hidden truths, forge new pathways, and piece together fragments of memories as you embark on this mesmerizing journey. In Gulf Echoes, the past is not a distant shore but a living, breathing realm awaiting your exploration.
